name: get the sensation brownies
instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees, grease 13 x 9 baking pan, in a large bowl , whisk together butter , sugar and vanilla, add eggs and stir until well combined, combine dry ingredients and blend well with wet ingredients, reserve 2 cups of batter and set aside, spread remaining batter in prepared pan, arrange peppermint patties in a single layer over batter , about 1 / 2 inch apart, carefully spread reserved 2 cups of batter on top, bake for 50- 55 minutes or until brownies begin to pull away from sides of pan, cool completely on wire rack and cut into squares
ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking cocoa, baking powder, salt, miniature peppermint patties
